name: Super Color Combat
description:
Enter a bright and fast combat tournament

//Navigation

WASD - Navigate Menu

A/D Change Frame Rate

K - Select

L - Cancel

//How To Fight

Go to How To Play For Translations/Controller

WASD = Movement

K = Punch

L = Kick

; = Block

O = Run

Down+Punch = Uppercut

Down+Kick = Sweep

Jump+Attack = Jumpkick

Block+Run = Breaker

Enter = Pause

//Specials

Press Start and go to MoveList

//2 Player

2ND PLAYER MUST HAVE A CONTROLLER TO PLAY
